openkms.gpj

Class GlobalPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • openkms.gpj.GlobalPlatform

  • public class GlobalPlatform
extends java.lang.Object
    The main Global Platform Service class. Provides most of the Global Platform functionality for managing GP compliant smart cards.

      • select

        public void select()
            throws GPException,
                   javax.smartcardio.CardException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Establish a connection to the security domain specified in the constructor or discovered. This method is required before doing openSecureChannel.
        Throws:
        GPException - if security domain selection fails for some reason
        javax.smartcardio.CardException - on data transmission errors
        java.io.IOException

      • openSecureChannel

        public void openSecureChannel(KeySet staticKeys,
                     int scpVersion,
                     int securityLevel)
                       throws javax.smartcardio.CardException,
                              GPException
        Establishes a secure channel to the security domain. The security domain must have been selected with open before. The keySet must have been initialized with setKeys before.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the arguments are out of range or the keyset is undefined
        javax.smartcardio.CardException - if some communication problem is encountered.
        GPException

      • loadCapFile

        public void loadCapFile(java.net.URL url,
               boolean includeDebug,
               boolean separateComponents,
               int blockSize,
               boolean loadParam,
               boolean useHash)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        GPException,
                        javax.smartcardio.CardException
        Convenience method, opens fileName and calls then loadCapFile(CapFile, boolean, boolean, int, boolean, boolean) with otherwise unmodified parameters.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file name of the applet cap file
        includeDebug -
        separateComponents -
        blockSize -
        loadParam -
        useHash -
        Throws:
        GPInstallForLoadException - if the install-for-load command fails with a non 9000 response status
        GPLoadException - if one of the cap file APDU's fails with a non 9000 response status
        javax.smartcardio.CardException - for low-level communication problems
        java.io.IOException - if opening fileName fails
        GPException

      • loadCapFile

        public void loadCapFile(CapFile cap,
               boolean includeDebug,
               boolean separateComponents,
               int blockSize,
               boolean loadParam,
               boolean useHash)
                 throws GPException,
                        javax.smartcardio.CardException
        Throws:
        GPException

      • installAndMakeSelecatable

        public void installAndMakeSelecatable(AID packageAID,
                             AID appletAID,
                             AID instanceAID,
                             byte privileges,
                             byte[] installParams,
                             byte[] installToken)
                               throws GPException,
                                      javax.smartcardio.CardException
        Install an applet and make it selectable. The package and applet AID must be present (ie. non-null). If one of the other parameters is null sensible defaults are chosen. If installation parameters are used, they must be passed in a special format, see parameter description below.

        Before installation the package containing the applet must be loaded onto the card, see loadCapFile.

        This method installs just one applet. Call it several times for packages containing several applets.

        Parameters:
        packageAID - the package that containing the applet
        appletAID - the applet to be installed
        instanceAID - the applet AID passed to the install method of the applet, defaults to packageAID if null
        privileges - privileges encoded as byte
        installParams - tagged installation parameters, defaults to 0xC9 00 (ie. no installation parameters) if null, if non-null the format is 0xC9 len data...
        Throws:
        GPException
        javax.smartcardio.CardException

      • makeDefaultSelected

        public void makeDefaultSelected(AID aid,
                       byte privileges)
                         throws javax.smartcardio.CardException,
                                GPException
        Throws:

      • deleteAID

        public void deleteAID(AID aid,
             boolean deleteDeps)
               throws GPException,
                      javax.smartcardio.CardException
        Delete file aid on the card. Delete dependencies as well if deleteDeps is true.
        Parameters:
        aid - identifier of the file to delete
        deleteDeps - if true delete dependencies as well
        Throws:
        GPDelete - if the delete command fails with a non 9000 response status
        javax.smartcardio.CardException - for low-level communication errors
        GPException

      • getStatus

        public AIDRegistry getStatus()
                      throws javax.smartcardio.CardException
        Get card status. Perform all possible variants of the get status command and return all entries reported by the card in an AIDRegistry.
        Returns:
        registry with all entries on the card
        Throws:
        javax.smartcardio.CardException - in case of communication errors
